title: [Lilokia's Armory]
[Lilokia's Weaponry]
[Lilokia's General Store]
description: A pair of crossed cavalry sabers hangs on one of the blue brocade walls, and a modwir beam ceiling rises overhead.  A serene golden wyvern fountain sits in one corner of a sanded pine floor.  There is an engraved pine case on one side of the shop and a large cherrywood cabinet on the other.
